com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker

Class RunManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker.RunManager

  • public class RunManager
extends Object
    Singleton class that manages the communication with the LocationManager and details about the current run.
    Author:
    Bill Phillips, Brian Hardy, ajkwak@users.noreply.github.com (AJ Parmidge)

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static RunManager get(Context c)
        Gets the singleton RunManager instance. If no instance currently exists, creates a new RunManager instance for the given context.
        Parameters:
        c - the context for the RunManager
        Returns:
        the current RunManager instance

      • startLocationUpdates

        public void startLocationUpdates()
        Request to start receiving location updates from the LocationManager.

      • stopLocationUpdates

        public void stopLocationUpdates()
        Request to stop receiving location updates from the LocationManager.

      • isTrackingRun

        public boolean isTrackingRun()
        Determine whether a Run is currently being tracked.
        Returns:
        true, if a run is currently being tracked; otherwise false

      • isTrackingRun

        public boolean isTrackingRun(Run run)
        Determine whether the given Run is being currently tracked by the RunManager.
        Parameters:
        run - the run to check
        Returns:
        true if the given Run is currently being tracked; otherwise false

      • startNewRun

        public Run startNewRun()
        Start a new run, and begin tracking (receiving current location updates for) that run.
        Returns:
        the newly started run

      • startTrackingRun

        public void startTrackingRun(Run run)
        Begin tracking the current location as part of the given run.
        Parameters:
        run - the run to track

      • stopRun

        public void stopRun()
        Stop the current run.

      • queryRuns

        public RunDatabaseHelper.RunCursor queryRuns()
        Gets a cursor for all of the runs currently in the database.
        Returns:
        a cursor for the runs currently stored in the Run database

      • getRun

        public Run getRun(long id)
        Gets the run with the given ID, if any exists
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the run to get
        Returns:
        the run with the given ID, if such exists; otherwise null

      • getCurrentRun

        public Run getCurrentRun()
        Gets the current run, if there is one
        Returns:
        the current run, or null, if no current run exists

      • insertLocation

        public void insertLocation(Location loc)
        Inserts the given location into the database as part of the current run.
        Parameters:
        loc - the location to insert

      • getLastLocationForRun

        public Location getLastLocationForRun(long runId)
        Gets the last location associated with the run with the given ID
        Parameters:
        runId - the ID of the run to query
        Returns:
        the last location of the run with the given ID, if such exists
